hook_text: Marvel's Ben-Gurion: INEVITABLE desert birth! Vanishing mandates, exploding history!

style_decision.reasoning: The prompt explicitly mentions 'Marvel Comics explosion!', 'comic smoke', and 'exploding panels,' all of which strongly point to a comic book art style. The energetic descriptions like 'bursts,' 'VANISHES,' and 'KA-POW!' also align perfectly with the dynamic and exaggerated visuals common in comics. Vibrant colors will enhance the energetic and impactful nature of this style, suiting Instagram's audience.

positioning_decision.reasoning: The prompt describes a visually busy scene with an explosion and comic book elements. Placing the text at the top center provides a clear, unobstructed view of the main action while keeping the text visible without interfering with the core visuals. Instagram's rule of avoiding the bottom 20% makes the top half a safer bet.

ffmpeg_command: ffmpeg -i outputs/israeli_pm_marvel_ep1_en/temp_files/base_video.mp4 -vf drawtext=text='Mandate Vanishes 💨':fontcolor=#FF6B6B:fontsize=55:font='Georgia-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.95:boxborderw=3:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,6.5\,9.0),drawtext=text='Kibbutz Power ✨':fontcolor=#5F27CD:fontsize=55:font='Trebuchet-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=3:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,15.5\,18.0),drawtext=text='The Legacy 🇮🇱':fontcolor=#2C3E50:fontsize=55:font='Georgia-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.95:boxborderw=3:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,24.5\,27.0),drawtext=text='#BenGurionEpic':fontcolor=#FFFFFF:fontsize=40:font='Helvetica-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#5F27CD@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,27.5\,30.5),drawtext=text='Follow for':fontcolor=#FFD700:fontsize=52:font='Impact':box=1:boxcolor=#800080@0.7:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1720:enable=between(t\,24.51\,25.91),drawtext=text='more':fontcolor=#FFD700:fontsize=52:font='Impact':box=1:boxcolor=#800080@0.7:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1640:enable=between(t\,26.01\,27.41) -c:a copy -y outputs/israeli_pm_marvel_ep1_en/temp_files/timed_overlays_base_video.mp4
